SELECT COUNT(*) FROM "follows" INNER JOIN "accounts" ON "accounts"."id" = "follows"."account_id" WHERE "accounts"."domain" = $?

SELECT axis.*, ( WITH new_followers AS ( SELECT follows.id FROM follows INNER JOIN accounts ON follows.account_id = accounts.id WHERE date_trunc(?, follows.created_at)::date = axis.period AND accounts.domain = ?::text ) SELECT count(*) FROM new_followers ) AS value FROM ( SELECT generate_series(date_trunc(?, ?::timestamp)::date, date_trunc(?, ?::timestamp)::date, interval ?) AS period ) AS axis
